ud3.3:1.4: The narrative employs a unique scheme in introducing the repetitions: _tedha_, _tete_, _teme_.
ud3.3:8.3: Here the Buddha invents the concept of “faint praise”.
ud3.3:15.2: Ānandajoti has “about them” for _te_ here, but in parallel phrases we find _no_, so this must be the second person singular pronoun.
